input2: Mr is a w/ long segment and focal LGD, s/p HALO RFA ablation with some improvement. He then failed to respond to HALO and was monitored yearly with EGDs when with low grade dysplasia and indefinite dysplasia was seen. EGD for Cryo. His last EGD showed persistent ulcer measuring 34cms. Path returned as Barretts oesophagus only.
input4:

Brother - atrial fibrillation.
